title: UK inflation rises by more than expected to 3.8%, largely driven by air fares
description: Prices rose by more than expected, pushing inflation to its highest level since January 2024.
content:
More to do to ease cost of living, Chancellor Rachel Reeves says
Image source, Reuters
We've just heard from Chancellor Rachel Reeves who says there is "more to do to ease the cost of living".

title: French prosecutors investigating death of man during live stream
description: Police in Nice have been probing alleged ‘deliberate violent acts’ against ‘vulnerable people’ that have ended up on the internet
content:
Prosecutors in the south of France have said they are investigating the death of a 46-year-old man who died during a live streaming event showing him being mistreated.
The man – whose real name is Raphael Graven, but was known online as Jean Pormanov... [1520 chars]

title: ‘Don’t call this racist’: row grows over motives behind England flag campaign
description: Organisers say they are just being patriotic but some suspect far right is behind ‘dangerous’ lamp-post movement
content: “This is NOT racist never has been never will be,” reads the fundraising page of a group calling itself the Wythall Flaggers, which by Tuesday afternoon had raised more than £2,000, mostly in small donations of £5 and £10. “We have members of the com... [4919 chars]

title: Donald Trump is becoming the greatest unifier of Europe since the end of the cold war
description: The US president may be helping Putin to destroy the west, but his vanity is causing Europeans to speak with one voice in defence of Ukraine, says Fabrizio Tassinari of the European University Institute in Florence
content: Seven is a biblical number, a number dear to ancient Rome, and the number of Cristiano Ronaldo’s lucky jersey. Perhaps it is also now going to be the answer to Henry Kissinger’s (probably apocryphal) question: what number do I call when I want to tal... [4529 chars]

title: Councils consider legal action over asylum hotels
description: Nigel Farage says Reform UK-controlled councils will do everything in their power to close the hotels.
content:
